Damn it, annoying!\""},{"lineNumber":48522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くくく、なんか知らんが身体が軽い。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehehe, I don't know why, but my body feels lighter."},{"lineNumber":48523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうした、ヘビ女！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What's wrong, snake woman!\""},{"lineNumber":48524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「図に、乗るんじゃないわよ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't get cocky...!\""},{"lineNumber":48525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、すごい……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, amazing...!"},{"lineNumber":48526,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのメディウサに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Against that Medusa...\""},{"lineNumber":48527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっすがアニキ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As expected of Aniki!"},{"lineNumber":48528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人を唯一倒せる男は伊達じゃねーぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The only man who can defeat a demon is no joke!\""},{"lineNumber":48529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕もいるぞー。いますよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm here too. Right here.\""},{"lineNumber":48530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「背中、煤けてますね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your back is scorched.\""},{"lineNumber":48531,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうだ、ヘビ女！　喰らえ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How about that, snake woman! Take this!\""},{"lineNumber":48532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……！　まずい、ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuh...! This is bad...!\""},{"lineNumber":48533,"originalJapaneseLine":"（殺しておくべきだった……！","translatedEnglishLine":"(I should have killed them...!"},{"lineNumber":48534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな、こんな人間がいるなんてっ……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"I never imagined such a human could exist...!)"},{"lineNumber":48535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもう、あいつこんな時に、どこへ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, geez, where the hell is that guy at a time like this...?\""},{"lineNumber":48536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph!\""},{"lineNumber":48537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああいかん、分かる、これはお嬢様の危機……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no good, I can tell—this is the young lady's crisis...!"},{"lineNumber":48538,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに駆けつけ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I must rush to her immediately...\""},{"lineNumber":48539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねぇねぇ、といれどこー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey hey, where's the toilet?\""},{"lineNumber":48540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっき行きましたでしょう！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You just went a moment ago, didn't you!?\""},{"lineNumber":48541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは私」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was me.\""},{"lineNumber":48542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その前は私」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And before that, me.\""},{"lineNumber":48543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬぬぬぬぬ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nnnnnnn!\""},{"lineNumber":48544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今も15人のピグが行列待ち。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now, 15 pigs are waiting in line."},{"lineNumber":48545,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他のトイレ、ある？　案内して」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is there another toilet? Please show us.\""},{"lineNumber":48546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはございますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There is, but..."},{"lineNumber":48547,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くう、分かりました、案内を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, understood, I'll guide you...\""},{"lineNumber":48548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひつじーーーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sheep----!"},{"lineNumber":48549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　トイレ流れないよーーー」","translatedEnglishLine":"The toilet won't flush---!\""},{"lineNumber":48550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもうーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, damn it------!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一閃されたメディウサの爪が、シィルの背を抉る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa's claw, struck in a flash, gouged into Shiru's back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしシィルは足を止めず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Shiru did not stop running,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま部屋に飛び込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and jumped straight into the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのシィルを、十数体の彫像が迎える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiru was greeted by a dozen or so statues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もつれる足が、そのうちの一体へと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her tangled feet went straight toward one of them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷いなく向かっていく。
状態回復の魔法が彫像を光に包み……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Healing magic enveloped the statue in light...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆっくりと、石化が解かれていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and slowly, the petrification was undone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦しげな表情が穏やかなものに代わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His pained expression changed to a calm one,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはランスの腕の中に倒れ込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Shiru collapsed into Rance's arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむご苦労。もっと早く来んか……むっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, well done. You should have come sooner... hmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの背を抱きとめた手に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the hand that held Shiru's back,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぬるりとしたものを感じ取って、
ランスの表情が変わる。
「やってくれたな、このビッチが！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You've gone and done it, you bitch!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予想外の事態に反応が遅れたメディウサの胸を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa, slow to react to the unexpected, had her chest cut open by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの刃が切り裂いた。
「俺様の奴隷どもを可愛がってくれたようだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems you took good care of my slaves..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、こいつ……！　ええい、鬱陶しい！」
「くくく、なんか知らんが身体が軽い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehe, I don't know why, but my body feels lighter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を唯一倒せる男は伊達じゃねーぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only man who can defeat a demon is no joke!"
"How about that, snake woman! Take this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな、こんな人間がいるなんてっ……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never imagined such a human could exist...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう、あいつこんな時に、どこへ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, geez, where the hell is that guy at a time like this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああいかん、分かる、これはお嬢様の危機……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, no good, I can tell—this is the young lady's crisis...!
I must rush to her immediately..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっき行きましたでしょう！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You just went a moment ago, didn't you!?"
"Right now, 15 pigs are waiting in line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のトイレ、ある？　案内して」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there another toilet? Please show us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くう、分かりました、案内を……」
トイレ流れないよーーー」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and jumped straight into the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのシィルを、十数体の彫像が迎える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiru was greeted by a dozen or so statues.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her tangled feet went straight toward one of them,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Shiru collapsed into Rance's arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむご苦労。もっと早く来んか……むっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, well done. You should have come sooner... hmm."

「やってくれたな、このビッチが！！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの刃が切り裂いた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems you took good care of my slaves..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、こいつ……！　ええい、鬱陶しい！」
「くくく、なんか知らんが身体が軽い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehe, I don't know why, but my body feels lighter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を唯一倒せる男は伊達じゃねーぜ！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな、こんな人間がいるなんてっ……！）

I must rush to her immediately..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっき行きましたでしょう！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You just went a moment ago, didn't you!?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there another toilet? Please show us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くう、分かりました、案内を……」
トイレ流れないよーーー」
